protein.specific_function: May mediate uptake of degraded synaptic material which could play an important role in synaptic remodeling. Can mediate the neuronal and glial uptake of the snake venom toxin taipoxin

reference.reference_text: Omeis IA, Hsu YC, Perin MS: Mouse and human neuronal pentraxin 1 (NPTX1): conservation, genomic structure, and chromosomal localization. Genomics. 1996 Sep 15;36(3):543-5.
